Query: select ifnull(avg(salesperinvoice),0) as averagesalesperinv from(select sum(sid.quantity * sid.unit_price) as salesperinvoice, si.id_sales_invoice from sales_invoice as si left join sales_invoice_detail as sid on si.id_sales_invoice = sid.id_sales_invoice where si.trans_date between {{StartDate}} and {{EndDate}} group by si.id_sales_invoice) as QuantityPerInvoice
Caption: Average Sales Per Invoice
